metadata.dc:title: Müller et al (2016) GPlates Reconstruction
metadata.dc:creator: Dietmar Müller
metadata.dc:subject: empty
metadata.dc:description: The Müller et al. (2016) rotation model builds on the previous Earthbyte compilation (Seton et al, 2012). The updated global model incorporates a range of recent regional studies including the South Atlantic, North Atlantic, Southeast Asia, East Gondwana, the Arctic, the Western Tethys, the Caribbean, and Southwest Pacific. The absolute reference frame is hybrid of global moving hotspot and paleomagnetic models.
metadata.dc:source: Müller, R.D., Seton, M., Zahirovic, S., Williams, S.E., Matthews, K.J., Wright, N.M., Shephard, G.E., Maloney, K.T., Barnett-Moore, N., Hosseinpour, M., Bower, D.J., Cannon, J., 2016. Ocean basin evolution and global-scale plate reorganization events since Pangea breakup, AREPS, 44, 107-138.
